shortdesc.ph: Interface used to implement media recording functionality.
Used to record client-side audio and video.

section.p:
can record the following:
Audio captured by the local microphone and encoded by the SDK in AAC format.
Video captured by the local camera and encoded by the SDK.
section.note: In the COMMUNICATION channel profile, this feature is not available if there are users in the channel using SDK versions earlier than v3.0.0.
